章.definition: chapter; section; clause; movement (of symphony); seal; badge; regulation; order

章回小說.definition: novel in chapters, main format for long novels from the Ming onwards, with each chapter headed by a summary couplet

章士釗.definition: Zhang Shizhao (1881-1973), revolutionary journalist in Shanghai, then established writer

章太炎.definition: Zhang Taiyan (1869-1936), scholar, journalist, revolutionary and leading intellectual around the time of the Xinhai revolution

章炳麟.definition: Zhang Taiyan 章太炎 (1869-1936), scholar, journalist, revolutionary and leading intellectual around the time of the Xinhai revolution

章甫薦履.definition: court crown beneath straw shoe (idiom); everything turned upside down

章程.definition: rules; regulations; constitution; statute; articles of association (of company); articles of incorporation; charter (of a corporation); by-laws

章臺.definition: street name in ancient Chang'an synonymous with brothel area; red-light district

章貢.definition: Zhanggong district of Ganzhou city 贛州市|赣州市[Gan4 zhou1 shi4], Jiangxi

章貢區.definition: Zhanggong district of Ganzhou city 贛州市|赣州市[Gan4 zhou1 shi4], Jiangxi
